body:
### Summary

UQTk provides a Python interface called PyUQTk that is not currently built. This feature request is to add a variant to build PyUQTk and add it to `PYTHONPATH`.

### Rationale

PyUQTk is a very useful, integral part to UQTk.

### Description

An alternative is to always build PyUQTk, but this would add overhead for those that will not use the PyUQTk interface.

### Additional information

```console
> spack --version
0.16.2-3824-c27e0223d5
```

### General information

- [X] I have run `spack --version` and reported the version of Spack
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: UQTk variant to build PyUQTk and add it to PYTHONPATH
